summary:
CHARTERED CERTIFIED ACCOUNTANT; ACCA, UK 
MASTER of SCIENCE in Electronics

EXECUTIVE SUMMARY 

A experienced member of multicultural management team with strong focus on solving challenges and achieving results. Track records of providing high quality financial and management report (company listed on stock exchange), consolidation, costs control and in depth working knowledge of IFRS. Extensive communication and leadership experience,ability to influence team and to develop full potential of staff. Analytical thinker with "can-do" attitude in order to generate more business, streamline and simplify monthly closing and processes across the group. Broad experience in creating and developing new ideas in all aspects of implementation of Accounting system/IT projects and bringing those ideas into practical application.

EXPERTISE

•	Compiling Interim and Annual Report according to IFRS and Dutch GAAP
•	Controlling, Management Reporting Budgeting and Forecasting 
•	Cash & Treasury Management, Collection
•	Process improvement, monthly closing worked out with "can-do" attitude
•	Revenue assurances and costs control especially in telecommunication business 
•	Evaluating effect of foreign currency translation
•	Advanced working knowledge of Excel

Alpesh’s investment performance has beaten the returns of Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway which only rose 89% in that time. He has consistently outperformed all the top performing managers in the UK All Companies sector over that 10 year period.

He is invited regularly on Bloomberg, CNBC, CNN, Al Jazzera and other major networks and has given investment speeches in US, China, India, Guatemala, Thailand among many others.

profile_positions.description:
Head of Reporting - Atrium European Real Estate  
	
Responsibilities:
-	Support strategic management with monthly financial analysis and ideas how to generate more business in order to achieve corporate vision and strategy
-	Solve challenges and manage “can do" attitude in the team in order to ensure consolidation process, financial and management reporting of the group, budget, forecast were prepared on time
-	Responsible for the effective communication with auditor and other consultants
-	Act as IFRS expert, ensure strong control environment and compliance with corporate accounting
-	Oversee all iSOX compliance, documentation
-	Lead a team of 6 country controllers, develop full potential of team , do performance reviews etc.

Achievements:
-	Shorten consolidation reporting period by building up strong team with “can be done” attitude and good relationship with local finance teams 
-	Conceptualise, design and deliver high quality Interim and Annual report English and German versions in line with IFRS
-	Lead further phases of Hyperion implementation – introduction of Hyperion locally, enabling entity level detail etc.
-	Engage by non-routine transactions e.g. disposal, merger and acquisition of companies. Oversee/prepare a position paper and memos assessing  the impact of the adoption of new IFRS standards on the Group’s consolidated financial statement
-	Lead further implementation of Intercompany reconciliation
-	Set up iSOX controls and documentation
-	Set-up model for the Employee Share Options Plan calculation of the fair value of granted options base on Black-Scholes model, prepare accounting instructions and disclosure according to IFRS
-	Set-up hedging documentation for the Interest rate SWAPs including the accounting instructions
-	Set-up EPRA Reporting (European Public Real Estate Association) EPRA Earnings, EPRA NAV, 
-	Design and set-up performance review process for the finance team

-	Provide ad-hoc analysis and support

Achievements:
-	Set-up Revenue Integrity and costs control  projects for the voice telephony fixed and mobile - minutes reconciliation, CDRs, internet services - subscriptions reconciliation
-	Engaged by sale of the company, M&A, due diligence, prospectus –pre IPO bonds issue and a few reorganizations in the Scarlet Group, 
-	Set-up Credit Management/Collection, Cash management process including reporting,

1992 – 1999 Audit Manager at PRICEWATERHOUSECOOPERS
	Responsibilities:

-	Prepare a workshops for the client and to perform it

-	Mentor and evaluate performance of the team members on the project
-	Analyze results; compare results with previous period results and explain variances, impact on business
